Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Okay, first it's Stranato's turn, he'll show you combat and stuff." Train W=
reck said. The others nodded and walked back into the base. Stranato turned=
 to Infectra.

"So, first of all, if someone fires at you, use something fo=
r ptotection, you can grab a rock or something, because around here, lots o=
f powerful weapons are used, stay away from Heavy Blaster Rifles if your no=
t the one holding them! Okay, watch this." Stranato said. He propped a dumm=
y up on his back. He swung his foot backwards and kicked the dummy in the g=
roin. Stranato then hit a belly to belly suplex on the dummy.

"Now, if som=
ething happens, like you getting into a bunch of trouble, play dead, they c=
ome close, bam! You blow their guts out!" Stranato said. Stranato fired his=
 eye beams into the sky. Stranato did a moonsault from the top of a rock.

=
"Never forget to surprise your opponent!" Stranato said.

"Oh, yeah, don't =
argue with the leaders, they get mad, and all the bases have autoguns and s=
hields, watch out for them." Stranato said. Stranato hopped onto a rock.

"=
Pick your weapons carefully, and never let your guard down, your best frien=
ds could be your enemy!" Stranato said.

"Protect the Ark, yeah, I know, we=
 don't fight for any reasons but our own, but if the Autobots get destroyed=
, you cease to exist! Oh, yeah, kick ass and win Olympic Gold!" Stranato sa=
id. Stranato nodded and laughed...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:=
21 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infectra stands up and follows the=
 Radicons* Infectra: I want you to show everything importent. Every detail =
please. *Infectra says to the Radicons*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
   From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, June 30, 20=
00 4:39 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "Okay, Airbomber will teac=
h you about some stuff first." Train Wreck said.

    "Okay, we are on the =
planet Earth, we are with the Maximlas, and we are trying to destroy the Pr=
edacons and Alliance, but however, right now we are at truce, so our enemie=
s are the Newcomers right now." Airbomber said.

    "Yeah, Airbomber got i=
t right, stupid truce. Well, anyway, to be successful in the Neo Beast Wars=
, you have to know the fine arts, come outside and let us show you." Strana=
to said. The Radicons walked out the door, motioning for Infectra to come a=
long...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:09 AM
     =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra looked at them all* Infectra=
: What's so horrid about this place? You must teach me, please. *Infectra s=
its up and looks at them waiting for some tips*
        ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        S=
ent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:17 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

        Train Wreck looks at her.

        "Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me=
 like when we got out spark shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped=
 out your spark and snuck it in, somebody must have hated you alot, but don=
't worry, yuor safe with us now." Train Wreck said.

        "Be careful, I=
 tried to kill a guy." Stranato said.

        "Stranato, don't worry about=
 it!" Airbomber said.

        "It seems you don't know about the war, you =
were peaceful on Cybertron, so lets teach you what to do to stay alive on t=
his horrid planet." Train Wreck said.

        "Yeah, first of all, ya gott=
a drink this stuff!" Stronghold said to Infectra, taking a big gulp of beer=
.

        "Yeah, and you smoke these!" Blender said, smoking a cigar. Trai=
n Wreck walked up and slapped them both in the back of the head.

        "=
I can help, I love to help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks over and smokes a =
cigar, blowing some smoke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck comes up behind A=
rrow and taps his shoulder. Arrow turns around and Train Wreck slaps him in=
 the face.

        "Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they don't know any=
 better." Train Wreck said to Infectra...
          ----- Original Message =
----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
         Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:05 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


          *The Bots optics open and she looks around* Infectra=
:...where am I????.......the last thing I remember I was seeing my friedns =
go plunging to the floor and then this large bot sends this claw out at me.=
...but......that's all I remember..... *She says to particular bot*
       =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
 =
           Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            OCC: I talked to Orchi=
d and she said she wanted a new character to be made from Drazom, but she d=
idn't want it to be anything like Drazom.
             
            Train W=
reck works on Drazom. He looks at all of the sparks they had in storage.

 =
           "Now how did this one get in here? This spark was never in a dea=
thmatch!" Train Wreck said.

            "So how did it get in there?" Stra=
nato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark, curious to find out wh=
o it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom, which was remade into what=
ever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks nothing like Drazom. Train W=
reck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the robot to come to life...
   =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizard=
s 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, June=
 29, 2000 10:21 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            =
  (OOC: I want to bring in a new character. I already have an idea..)
     =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
   =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, June 2=
9, 2000 9:08 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


             =
   Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted t=
o die, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife ha=
d no affect, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his j=
ob he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Ra=
dicon's wrecked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's bod=
y on a table.

                "Any way we can bring him back? We can repro=
gram him to serve us." Stranato said.

                "I don't think so, h=
is spark looks to be extinguished, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya."=
 Train Wreck said.

                "I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranat=
o said.

                "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to death, =
just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

                "No, you =
don't understand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't=
 understand why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato=
 said. He sighed.

                "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

         =
       "No, you are acting stupid now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out y=
our intelligence circuits and your logic circuits." Train Wreck said, inter=
upting Stranato.

                "I hope your right." Stranato said. Train=
 Wreck looked at the body.

                "We could always put a new spar=
k in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

  =
              "We could have used him, and instead we let him die and didn'=
t save him, and I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

              =
  OCC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark collecti=
on (From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new charac=
ter with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body an=
d you can bring in a new character without having him or her look like Draz=
om at all, your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body even, ju=
st pick something, please...
                  ----- Original Message -----=
 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
         =
         Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  *The knife hit Dra=
zom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It was already snowing which made=
 him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring out of his back* Drazom:.......=
..... *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn't really the knife. It was co=
ldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies there......and mutters one wor=
d..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's optics flicker and fade out* *He =
lived to love....he lived to die.....That was a queston that would never be=
 answered*





                  (OOC: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots =
page. as that he died from the lack of emch fluid and because of how cold i=
t was)
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                  =
  From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
      Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
                    Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


                    The Radicons had walked off and left=
 Drazom, but now they were walking back and they seen him again. Airbomber =
laughed.

                    "There's the guy I saved, I wonder why he wan=
ts to die?" Airbomber asked.

                    "I don't know, but I will=
 oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom slowly.=
 Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the People's Bas=
e, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

        =
            Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

             =
       "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.

             =
       "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching Str=
anato...
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
        From: ilovealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
                      Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
            =
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      *Drazom slowl=
y turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die=
 for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's =
optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I A=
M!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and mech flui=
d pours out of his side and he falls back to the ground shivering from how =
cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
                        ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
                        From: THECODE 
         =
               To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Tuesda=
y, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
                        Subject: Neo Beast Wars

=

                        Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa=
 and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the =
battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnum=
bered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

                        =
"Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.
=

                        "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold =
reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

          =
              "We left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Str=
onghold said.

                        "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

         =
               "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and=
 so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

                    =
    The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that=
 none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The=
 People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

              =
          "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                    =
    "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                        "Never=
 mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and us=
hered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

               =
         Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

                 =
       "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show =
up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

         =
               "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

 =
                       Dracona didn't hear and landed next to the People's =
Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the=
 Poeple's base through the secret passage way, the computer reconizing them=
 as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

              =
          "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called o=
ut. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

                     =
   "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enoug=
h to put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room befo=
re?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender =
followed.

                        "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, runnin=
g into the room. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically upon order from Tra=
in Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room to sort out their proble=
ms. There was alot of banging, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name call=
ing, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a table to play cards with Drac=
ona.

                        "Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We=
'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold said.

                        "W=
hat are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

                 =
       "I have more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting =
fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

                        "How c=
ome we can't all get along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. S=
tranato looked at him like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the c=
orner.

                        "You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you d=
on't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Tr=
ain Wreck yelled.

                        "Yeah, and nobody is getting out=
 of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

                =
        Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and started=
 pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in the w=
all for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train Wre=
ck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Bl=
ender joined them before long.

                        "Say, you guys, it'=
s really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

                  =
      "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arro=
w said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stron=
ghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

                        Plintissa=
 and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgewa=
y, taking a walk across a field...

---------------------------------------=
